header.note:
This TMX file is the master repository for the English labels used in the Twetailer application. The content is edited by the developers who generate the unique identifiers, the notes for the translators, the label/message to be displayed, and custom tags used by the build system.
This is the unique repository containing: - Information used by the browser-part of the application (dojo tech stack), - Information used by the webtier-part of the application (Java tech stack), - Information used by the layout system (Java tech stack in 7.1-can be pushed dojo-side later).
This TMX is submitted to the translation department and this entity returns many others TMX files, as many as languages required for the product.
Labels and messages defined in this TMX files and its localized versions are published at build time: - As properties files to be handled by the PropertiesResourceBundle class, - As JavaScript files defining simple maps. The target type is chosen thanks to the custom property:
Note to developers: 1) When the usage of one label occurs many time, don't hesitate to define many entries if you think that the context is different. 2) If the usage of the custom tags is important for the build process, giving information to the translators via the tag is also very important for the overall quality of the product. Don't hesitate to link entries if the labels/messages are related. Don't hesitate to give samples to illustrate your comments. 3) Be sure to generate unique identifiers. Be consistent the unique identifier format. 4) All text inserted in the tag is rendered as is. Take care of the return-to-line and spacing.
IMPORTANT NOTES: 1) Everything rendered between the tags and are rendered. So be careful to NOT insert return-to-line or extra spaces. 2) Forbidden characters are : ampersand, quotes, double-quotes, less-than. and greater-than signs Their unicode value MUST be used in place: - ampersand: \u0026 - double quotes: \u0022 (for content going into dojotk resource bundles only) - less than: \u003c - greater than: \u003e - non break space: \u00a0 Note that using th single quote is safe. 3) All messages being displayed in a Web browser, it's possible to use HTML sequences, but they MUST be escaped correctly: "" should become: "\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e". Other HTML codes (like —) are safe as the corresponding UTF-8 sequence.

tu.note: IMPORTANT: Native transcription of the language (e.g. Dansk, Deutsch, English).| IMPORTANT: "English" should not be just translated!| IMPORTANT: If the rest of the xml:lang attribute is left with the value "en", it's crucial to update the one of this entry with the correct value (e.g. fr, it, zh_CN, etc.).

Just an entry made available for the unit tests.| To enhance the reading of this document converted to HTML, insert a trailing pipe sign at the end of a paragraph to force a return-to-line to be inserted.| Otherwise, the text is rendered one one line (the browser will wrapped the text).
Name of the entire application
Lusanga mantra

tuv.seg: #Demo, 140, 24906, AKA, Amazon, Attribute, Backup, Command-line, Consumer, CRUD, Demand-crud, Fee, Flag, Flagged, Founders, Free, Friend, Fulfil, Hash, IM, List-demands-private, List-demands-public, List-proposal, List-store, List-tag, MI, Note, Object, Rate, Register, Register-link, Register-retailer, Register-salesassociate, Register-store, Reserve, Reserved, Retailer, Salesassociate, Sentiment, Settle, Settled, State-flow, Twitter

body.tu:
2 javarb Report an unexpected error while processing the raw command.| {0}: raw command key| {1}: an optional information, in English only.
:-( The System encountered an unexpected error! {1}. You can resend your message, or, report incident identifier: 323-{0}.

tu.note: Returned to the end-user whenever there's a DatastoreTinmeoutException thrown by App Engine back-end. See: http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/java/javadoc/com/google/appengine/api/datastore/DatastoreTimeoutException.html

tuv.seg: :-( Busy, busy, busy... Sorry, but could you please retry your request in few minutes?

tu.note: Returned to the end-user whenever there's an issue while processing his message.

tuv.seg: :-( Sorry, but I can't understand your e-mail message. Can you please try sending again from a different email application?

tu.note: For the Twitter adapter, message sent to non followers.| {0} is the sender screen name.

tuv.seg: @{0} To protect your privacy, Follow Twetailer and then send your request via Direct Messages - like requesting help with "d twetailer ?"

tu.note: Error message generated when the given action is not recognized.| {0}: action label

tuv.seg: :-( Action {0} is not recognized by the System. Send '?action' for help.

tu.note: Error message generated when the given action is not allowed by the user's profile.| {0}: action label

tuv.seg: :-( Action {0} is not allowed by your profile. Send '?{0}' for help.
:-( If you wish to Cancel a Demand, please try again by sending !cancel ref:your-reference-number.
:-( Please verify the Demand Reference number you wish to Cancel and try again.

tu.note: {0}: demand key| {1}: demand state

tuv.seg: :-( You can't !cancel Demand reference:{0} in the state:{1}.
:-( Please verify the Proposal number you wish to Cancel and try again.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key| {1}: proposal state

tuv.seg: :-( You can't !cancel Proposal:{0} in the state:{1}.
:-( Please verify the Demand Reference number you wish to Close and try again.

tu.note: {0}: demand key| {1}: demand state

tuv.seg: :-( You can't !close Demand reference:{0} in the state:{1}.

tu.note: {0}: demand key

tuv.seg: :-) Thanks for Closing Demand reference:{0} - which will be reflected in your Twetailer Rating shortly.

tu.note: {0}: demand key| {1}: proposal key

tuv.seg: FYI. Demand reference:{0} has been closed by the Consumer. | Hint: Send "!close proposal:{1}", or, "!flag proposal:{1} note:enter-your-note-here" to improve your Twetailer Rating.
:-( Please verify the Proposal number you wish to Close and try again.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key| {1}: proposal state

tuv.seg: :-( You can't !close Proposal:{0} in the state:{1}.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key

tuv.seg: :-) Thanks for Closing Proposal:{0} - which will be reflected in your Twetailer Rating shortly.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key| {1}: demand key

tuv.seg: FYI. Proposal:{0} has been closed by the Retailer. | Hint: Send "!close ref:{1}", or, "!flag ref:{1} note:enter-your-note-here" to improve your Twetailer Rating.
:-( You can only !close Proposals or Demands.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key| {1}: demand key| {2}: demand state

tuv.seg: :-( You can only !confirm proposal:{0} for Demand reference:{1} when it's in state:{2}.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key| {1}: demand key| {2}: demand tags| {3}: store key {4}: store name

tuv.seg: :-) Thank you for confirming Proposal:{0} for Demand ref:{1}, tags:{2} | Store:{3}, {4} will be asked to mark and hold Demand ref:{1}

tu.note: {0}: proposal key| {1}: proposal tags| {2}: demand key

tuv.seg: :-) Proposal:{0} for tags:{1} has been confirmed.| Please mark, hold for Consumer with Demand reference:{2} and then !close proposal:{0}, or, !flag ref:{2} note:your-note-here.
FYI: Demo Sales Associate will now !close your Demand
:-( Please verify the Proposal number you wish to Confirm and try again.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key

tuv.seg: :-) Proposal:{0} has been declined and further updates halted.
:-( Please verify the Proposal number you wish to Decline and try again.
:-( As a Consumer, you can only !decline Proposals whereas Retailers can only !decline Demands.

tu.note: {0}: demand key {1}: demand state

tuv.seg: :-( You can only !delete Cancelled Demands. Demand reference:{0} is in the state:{1}.| If this is the Demand you intended to !delete then send '!cancel reference:{0}' and try again.

tu.note: {0}: demand key

tuv.seg: :-) Demand reference:{0} has been marked for deletion and no longer accessible
:-( Please verify the Demand Reference number you wish to Delete and try again.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key {1}: proposal state

tuv.seg: :-( You can only !delete Cancelled Proposals. Proposal:{0} is in the state:{1}.| If this is the Proposal you intended to !delete then send '!cancel proposal:{0}' and try again.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key

tuv.seg: :-) Proposal:{0} has been marked for deletion and no longer accessible
:-( Please verify the Proposal number you wish to Delete and try again.
:-( You can only !delete Proposals or Demands.

tu.note: Message confirming a successful demand creation.| {0}: dynamically generated demand key

tuv.seg: :-( Please verify the Demand Reference number you wish to Update and try again.

tu.note: {0}: demand key {1}: demand state

tuv.seg: :-( Demand reference:{0} is currently in state:{1} and can't be updated.
:-( Please verify the Demand Reference number and try again.
:-( Please verify the Proposal number and try again.
:-( Please verify the Store number and try again.

tu.note: Message informing that no result can be displayed for the !list command.

tuv.seg: :-) There are no active Demands to list.

tu.note: Message introducing the series of messages to be sent in response to a !list command.| {0}: number of messages to be sent
Message informing that location information is missing for the !list store:* command.

tuv.seg: :-( Please provide a valid Locale(postal/zip code and country - like 'us', or 'ca') by updating your Demand like "ref:{0} locale:12345 us"

tu.note: Message informing that no result can be displayed for the !list store:* command. {0}: postal code {1}: country code

tuv.seg: You've just submitted a locale:{0} {1} the system does not know yet. After some verifications, Twetailer will contact you shortly.

tu.note: Message informing that no result can be displayed for the !list store:* command. {0}: postal code {1}: country code {2}: range {3}: range unit

tuv.seg: :-( I can't find any Stores within {2}{3} of locale:{0} {1}.

tu.note: Message introducing the series of messages to be sent in response to a !list store:* command.| {0}: number of messages to be sent

tuv.seg: :-( Please verify the Proposal number you wish to update and try again.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key {1}: proposal state

tuv.seg: :-( Proposal:{0} is currently in state:{1} and can't be updated.

tu.note: Message confirming a successful proposal creation.| {0}: dynamically generated proposal key

tuv.seg: FYI. You are no longer supplying any tags.

tu.note: {0}: unique tag

tuv.seg: FYI. You are now supplying only one tag: {0}.

tu.note: {0}: list of tags, separated by a blank space {1}: list size
Inform the consumer the demand should have at least one tag.| {0}: demand key

tuv.seg: :-( Please update your Demand with at least tag by sending 'reference:{0} tags:your-tags-here'.

tu.note: Inform the consumer the expiration date should be in the future.| {0}: demand key

tuv.seg: :-( Please ensure your Demand's Expiration date is in the future by sending 'reference:{0} expiration:YYYYMMDD'.

tu.note: Inform the consumer the range is too small.| {0}: demand key| {1}: given distance| {2}: system limit (hardcoded: 5 km)

tuv.seg: :-( Please ensure your Demand's Range is greater than, or, equal to {1} km by sending 'reference:{0} range:your-range-and-km'.

tu.note: Inform the consumer the range is too big.| {0}: demand key| {1}: given distance| {2}: system limit (hardcoded: 40075 km)

tuv.seg: :-( Please ensure your Demand's Range is within Earth's boundaries ({1} km) by sending 'reference:{0} range:your-range-and-km'.

tu.note: Inform the consumer the range is too small.| {0}: demand key| {1}: given distance| {2}: system limit (hardcoded: 2.5 mi)

tuv.seg: :-( Please ensure your Demand's Range is greater than, or, equal to {1} km by sending 'reference:{0} range:your-range-and-km'.

tu.note: Inform the consumer the range is too big.| {0}: demand key| {1}: given distance| {2}: system limit (hardcoded: 24906 mi)

tuv.seg: :-( Please ensure your Demand's Range is within Earth's boundaries ({1} miles) by sending 'reference:{0} range:your-range-and-mi'.

tu.note: Inform the consumer the quantity cannot be 0.| {0}: demand key

tuv.seg: :-( Please ensure your Demand's Quantity exceeds zero by sending 'reference:{0} qty:1'.

tu.note: Inform the consumer that the locale information is missing.| {0}: demand key

tuv.seg: :-( Please update your Demand's Locale by sending 'ref:{0} locale:your-postal/zip-code-and-country(us,ca)', like 'ref:{0} locale:12345 us'

tu.note: Inform the consumer that the locale information is invalid.| {0}: demand key| {1}: given postal code| {2}: given country code.

tuv.seg: :-( Please update your Demand with a valid Locale - postal/zip code and country (us, ca) like 'ref:{0} locale:12345 us'.

tu.note: Inform the consumer that the information for the locale cannot be retrieved.| {0}: demand key

tuv.seg: The Locale information for Demand reference:{0} cannot be retrieved. Please provide them another time (postal/zip code and country - like 'us', or, 'ca').

tu.note: {0}: demand key {1}: serialized list of rejected hash tags, separated by a space

tuv.seg: :-( #demo is currently the only supported hash (#) tag. If you wish, remove the # from the rejected list and update your Demand tags by sending '!demand ref:{0} {1}"

tu.note: Inform the consumer that the locale information is invalid.| {0}: original command.

tuv.seg: :-( I can't find that Locale. Please update your Demand with a valid one like 'ref:{0} locale:12345 us', or, 'ref:{0} locale:h0h 0h0 ca'

tu.note: Inform a sale associate about a new demand.| {0}: demand key| {1}: given tags, separated by a space| {2}: expiration date, ISO formatted| Future release: total:enter-final-price-including-all-taxes-and-service-fees

tuv.seg: 1/2 FYI. Can you supply Demand ref:{0} tags:{1} expires:{2}? If yes then send the following... | 2/2 '!propose ref:{0} tags:your-description-here price:your-price-here'

tu.note: Inform a sale associate about a new demand.| {0}: demand key| {1}: given tags, separated by a space| {2}: expiration date, ISO formatted| {3}: quantity| Future release: total:enter-final-price-including-all-taxes-and-service-fees

tuv.seg: 1/2 FYI. Can you supply Demand ref:{0} tags:{1} qty:{3} expires:{2}? If yes then send the following... | 2/2 '!propose ref:{0} tags:your-description-here qty:your-qty-here price:your-price-here'

tu.note: Inform the consumer that twetailer has found no stores to serve his demand

tuv.seg: FYI. 1/2 I currently don't have any Stores supplying those tags but will keep checking until the expiration date.| 2/2 Please ask any potential Stores you may visit to register with Twetailer so we may improve our service in your community.

tu.note: Inform the consumer that twetailer has contacted new stores.| {0}: demand key| {1}: total number of sale associates contacted so far| {2}: number of sale associates just contacted

tuv.seg: FYI. 1/2 {2} additional Sales Associates have been notified of your Demand ref:{0}, for a total of {1}.| 2/2 I'll continue checking until the expiration date.

tu.note: Inform the sale associate the proposal should have at least one tag.| {0}: proposal key:

tuv.seg: :-( Please update your Proposal with at least tag by sending 'proposal:{0} tags:your-tags-here'.

tu.note: Inform the sale associate the quantity cannot be 0.| {0}: proposal key

tuv.seg: :-( Please ensure your Proposal's Quantity exceeds zero by sending 'proposal:{0} qty:1'.

tu.note: Inform the sale associate a unit price or the total price is required.| {0}: proposal key| Future release

tuv.seg: :-( Please ensure your Proposal has a unit Price and final Total cost by sending '!propose price:unit-price total:final-cost'

tu.note: Inform the sale associate the demand reference is missing.| {0}: proposal key

tuv.seg: :-( Please ensure your Proposal has a Reference number by sending '!propose ref:see-previously-sent-ref'

tu.note: Inform the sale associate that the given reference is invalid.| {0}: proposal key| {1}: demand key

tuv.seg: :-( Please ensure your Proposal has the appropriate Reference number by sending '!propose ref:see-previously-sent-ref'

tu.note: {0}: proposal key {1}: serialized list of rejected hash tags, separated by a space

tuv.seg: 1/2 :-( #demo is currently the only supported hash (#) tag. | 2/2 If you wish, remove the # from the rejected list and update your Proposal tags by sending '!proposal proposal:{0} {1}"

tu.note: Inform a consumer about a new proposal.| {0}: proposal key| {1}: proposal tags| {2}: demand key| {3}: demand tags| {4}: demand expiration date| {5}: store key, identifying the place where the sale associate works.| {6}: store name | {7}: currency symbol| {8}: proposed unit price (expected to be unit price)| {9}: proposed total cost (expected to be total cost, taxes included)

tuv.seg: 1/3 Re: Demand ref:{2} tags:{3} expires:{4}. I have ... | 2/3 Proposal:{0} tags:{1} price:{7}{8} total:{7}{9} | 3/3 From Store:{5} {6}. You can send '!confirm proposal:{0}', or, '!decline proposal:{0}'

tu.note: Inform a consumer about a new proposal.| {0}: proposal key| {1}: proposal tags| {2}: demand key| {3}: demand tags| {4}: demand expiration date| {5}: store key, identifying the place where the sale associate works.| {6}: store name | {7}: currency symbol| {8}: proposed unit price (expected to be unit price)|

tuv.seg: 1/3 Re: Demand ref:{2} tags:{3} expires:{4}. I have ... | 2/3 Proposal:{0} tags:{1} price:{7}{8} | 3/3 From Store:{5} {6}. You can send '!confirm proposal:{0}', or, '!decline proposal:{0}'

tu.note: Inform a consumer about a new proposal.| {0}: proposal key| {1}: proposal tags| {2}: demand key| {3}: demand tags| {4}: demand expiration date| {5}: store key, identifying the place where the sale associate works.| {6}: store name | {7}: currency symbol| {8}: proposed total cost (expected to be total cost, taxes included)

tuv.seg: 1/3 Re: Demand ref:{2} tags:{3} expires:{4}. I have ... | 2/3 Proposal:{0} tags:{1} total:{7}{8} | 3/3 From Store:{5} {6}. You can send '!confirm proposal:{0}', or, '!decline proposal:{0}'

tu.note: Inform the sale associate his proposal cannot be submitted to the demand.| {0}: proposal key| {1}: demand key| {2}: demand state

tuv.seg: :-( Your proposal:{0} can't be attached to Demand reference:{1} in state:{2}.

tu.note: Default subject for e-mail sent to end-users
Prefix put in front of e-mail subject when replying to an end-user message

Message generated automatically to demand located with postal code "H0H0H0".| The content is displayed as the "Proposal tags" (see message pp_inform_consumer_about_proposal). IMPORTANT: Accomodate this message to provide a natural sentence ;)
